arts.ttl: Mexico vs. South Korea (2-2) highlights – Lee provides key assist
arts.sum: Watch the highlights of Mexico vs. South Korea, featuring goals by Raul Jimenez, Son Heung-min, Oh Hyeon-gyu, and Santiago Gimenez. In a friendly match played at the Seoul World Cup Stadium on Wednesday, South Korea faced Mexico. The match included one player from Paris Saint-Germain on the South Korean team: Lee Kang-in (24-year-old attacking midfielder/winger). […]

arts.ttl: Watch: Santiago Gimenez scores stunning last-minute goal for Mexico vs. South Korea
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Santiago Gimenez was on the scoresheet for Mexico last night, and the circumstances surrounding the goal could prove to be huge for the AC Milan striker. Heading into the final part of the summer window there was a lot of noise about Gimenez potentially being offloaded by Milan just a few months after he was […] The post Watch: Santiago Gimenez scores stunning last-minute goal for Mexico vs. South Korea appeared first on SempreMilan.
